popover.primary: A mastery path focused on healing and restorative powers
A mastery path focused on melee attacks and protective effects
A mastery path focused on melee attacks and weakening effects

data.name: Absence of Faith
data.description: You deal 164 damage to your enemy and call upon Sigmar to Curse them for 10 seconds, causing all healing effects used on them to become 50% less effective.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 424 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Avatar of Sigmar
data.description: Increases the Strength, Willpower, Toughness, Initiative, Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, and Intelligence of all group mates withing 100 feet by 80 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Bludgeon
data.description: A powerful attack which deals 202 damage to your enemy. If behind your target, ignores 660 armor.

data.name: Breath of Sigmar
data.description: Resurrects a fallen ally with 20% health.

data.name: Castigation
data.description: A strike that deals 101 damage to your enemy, and an additional 150 damage over 10 seconds, and reduces their Initiative by 80.

data.name: Charged Fury
data.description: Attacks which generate Righteous Fury will now generate 10 additional points.

data.name: Cleansing Power
data.description: Purify will also cleanse your entire group. It will not cleanse more than 1 effect per target.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.

data.name: Divine Aegis
data.description: Increases your target's armor by 1320 and all resistances by 504 for 15 seconds.

data.name: Divine Aid
data.description: Heals an ally for 370 points, and an additional 445 over 5 seconds.

data.name: Divine Amazement
data.description: You call upon the power of Sigmar, dealing 300 damage every second to all enemies in a 30 feet area around you for the next 4 seconds. Sigmar returns all the damage done to your enemies to you as health.

data.name: Divine Assault
data.description:
You repeatedly assault an enemy, attacking their very spirit and offering it up to Sigmar's will. You strike the target up to four times over 3 seconds, dealing 109 Spirit damage per hit. Each hit heals your defensive target for 350% of the damage that was dealt.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Righteous Fury.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your casted heals become 20% less effective.

data.name: Divine Justice
data.description: Prayer of Righteousness will now deal 375 Spirit damage.

data.name: Divine Light
data.description: Your group mates within 100 feet become surrounded by a magical barrier for 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 1162 damage for each person.

data.name: Divine Mend
data.description:
A quick heal that restores 581 health.
Not affected by cooldown modification abilities.

data.name: Divine Petitioning
data.description: Reduces Supplication's cost by 15 Action Points.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Divine Replenishment
data.description: Your group mates within 100 feet become more driven. For the next 10 seconds, anytime they hit an enemy with a melee attack, they will regain 50 Action Points.

data.name: Divine Shock
data.description: The force of Sigmar's displeasure slams into all enemies in front of you, up to 30 feet away, and sends them flying backwards.

data.name: Divine Warding
data.description: Any time your direct heal critically heals an ally, you will become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to 30 seconds which will absorb up to 712 damage.

data.name: Emperor's Ward
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Endless Guilt
data.description: The snare from Weight Of Guilt will now last for 10 seconds, and affects all enemies within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Exalted Defenses
data.description: Any time you defend against an attack, your casted healing abilities will become 20% more effective for 10 seconds.

data.name: Fanaticism
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 10% and your chance to parry by 10%, but reduces the effectiveness of your casted healing abilities by 20%.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Fueled Fury
data.description: Whenever you are hit by an enemy, you have a 25% chance to gain 35 Righteous Fury.  Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Gift of Life
data.description: All of your group mates within 100 feet have their armor increased by 1320, Block, Parry, Dodge and Disrupt by 25, and all Resists by 504 for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Grace of Sigmar
data.description:
The healing from lifetaps are increased by 25%.

When wearing a shield Divine Strike will hit up to two additional enemies within 25ft of your target.

data.name: Greave of Sigmar
data.description: Sigmar's Fist will now also increase your ally's Toughness as well, and will reduce your enemy's Strength and Toughness by 120.

data.name: Guilty Soul
data.description: Any time you critically hit with a direct damage ability in the Path Of Wrath, your target will suffer an additional 740 Spirit Damage over 12 seconds and gain a blessing which increases your Path Of Wrath abilities by 5%. The blessing stacks up to 4 times.

data.name: Hammer of Sigmar
data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Target must be below 50% health
Builds 30 Righteous Fury
data.description: Deals 502 damage and will almost always deal critical damage to a wounded foe.

data.name: Hastened Divinity
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed will be increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Healing Hand
data.description: Heals your target for 1700 points over 15 seconds.

data.name: Intimidating Repent
data.description: Repent will always also affect all enemies within 30 feet of you for 5 seconds.

data.name: Judgement
data.description: You call down the holy judgement of Sigmar, dealing 127 Spirit damage to the enemy and reducing their movement speed by 20% for 2 seconds.

data.name: Leading the Prayer
data.description: Whenever Prayer Of Devotion heals one of your groupmates, you will also become healed for the same amount.

data.name: Martyr's Blessing
data.description:
You open your soul to Sigmar and become a living force of holy power for up to 3 seconds, as long as you maintain your concentration. Each second, all allies within 30 feet of you will regain 246 health, and you will consume 20 Righteous Fury.
This effect will end if you lose your concentration or if you run out of Righteous Fury.

data.name: Penance
data.description: You attack all targets within 30 feet for 1200 damage and Stagger them for 6 seconds,preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Pious Restoration
data.description: You call upon Sigmar to Bless everyone in your group within 100 feet, restoring 783 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Prayer of Absolution
data.note: Only one Prayer may be active at a time.
data.description: You chant a bolstering prayer, increasing the armor of group mates who stay within 100 feet of you by 660.

data.name: Prayer of Devotion
data.note: Only one Prayer may be active at a time.
data.description: Any time a groupmate within 100 feet of you attacks an enemy, there is a 20% chance that they will regain 300 health.

data.name: Prayer of Righteousness
data.note: Only one Prayer may be active at a time.
data.description: Any time one of your groupmates within 100 feet hits an enemy, there is a 20% chance they will deal an additional 225 Spirit damage.

data.name: Purge
data.note:
Builds 25 Righteous Fury
Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one Enchantment from your enemy and deals 127 damage.

data.name: Purify
data.note:
Requires 25 Righteous Fury
Target must be Cursed or Hexed
data.description: You purify an ally, removing one Curse or Hex.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Refreshing Radiance
data.description: Whenever you heal an ally, there is a 25% chance that they will regain 50 Action Points, but this effect will not work on you.

data.name: Repent
data.description:
You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

If wearing a shield or great weapon this will also affect all enemies within 30 feet of you for 5 seconds.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Shield of Faith
data.description: Increases your chance to Disrupt enemy spells by 10%.

data.name: Sigmar's Favor
data.description: Any time that you are healed by a direct heal, there is a 25% chance that you will regain an additional 135 hit points as well.

data.name: Sigmar's Fist
data.description: A blessed attack which deals 192 damage to your target, and increases your defensive target's Strength by 120 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Sigmar's Grace
data.description: The might of Sigmar infuses everyone in your group within 80 feet, increasing their Wounds by 80 for 1 hour.

data.name: Sigmar's Radiance
data.description: You smash into your enemy, dealing 161 damage to them.  The power of Sigmar erupts from your weapon, healing any of your groupmates within 100 feet for 161 points plus 80% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Sigmar's Shield
data.description: You smash your weapon into your enemy, dealing 239 damage to them.  Your defensive target becomes Blessed for up to 10 seconds, and will regain 150 health each time they're attacked.  You will lose 10 Righteous Fury each time this blessing occurs, and the effect will end if you run out of Righteous Fury to power it with.

data.name: Sigmar's Vision
data.description:
Deals 239 damage to your enemy and Blesses your defensive target for 15 seconds, increasing their chance to parry attacks by 10%.

Additionally, when wearing a shield your chance to block will be increased by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Smite
data.description:
A sweeping blow which deals 138 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 50 feet away.
Builds an additional 15 Righteous Fury for each enemy that you strike.

data.name: Soulfire
data.description: Deals 555 Spirit damage over 9 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Supplication
data.description: For the next 5 seconds, you will convert 30 action points into 30 Righteous Fury every second.  If you run out of action points or break your concentration, this effect will end.

data.name: Touch of the Divine
data.description: Restores 477 health to all group mates within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Unwavering Faith
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: Vow of Silence
data.description: A powerful strike which deals 239 damage to your enemy and knocks the wind out of them for 4 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Weight of Guilt
data.description: Deals 239 damage to your target.  If they are Cursed, then they will also become snared, reducing their run speed by 40% for 6 seconds.

data.name: Divine Strike
data.description: You crush your enemy, dealing 86 Spirit damage to them.  The divine power of Sigmar heals your defensive target and any allies within 20 feet of them for 150% of the damage that was dealt.

data.name: Sacrifice
data.note:
Requires Shield
Requires 25 Righteous Fury per second
data.description:
You shield your team with your life force, you will suffer 450 damage every second, any groupmates within 100ft will have 787 health restored to them.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Righteous Fury.

data.name: Divine Warden
data.description: You attack with your buckler dealing 239 damage to your enemy, and increases your chance to block by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Shielding Grace
data.note:
Requires Shield
Requires 25 Righteous Fury per second
data.description:
You channel Sigmar's Shielding Grace making you immune from any roots or snare effects and increasing Parry, Dodge and Disrupt of you and your Group by 10%. Each second your group is surrounded by a protective barrier absorbing up to 255 ranged damage.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Righteous Fury.

data.name: Sigmar's Wrath
data.description: Sigmar's Wrath rises within you, your attacks will ignore 25% the victim's armor and the cooldowns of Path of Wrath abilities will be reduced by 5 seconds during the next 20 seconds.

data.name: Unstoppable Wrath
data.description: Your wrath removes all roots and snares from you.  For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you.
